whyMe.text: I enjoy coding because I like understanding how things work and solving problems step by step. I find it motivating to turn an idea into something that actually works. I stay focused even when things get complex, and I appreciate working with others to find better solutions together.

currentlyLearning.title: I am currently learning
currentlyLearning.goal: I regularly learn new technologies and deepen my knowledge step by step. This helps me grow my skills and apply them more effectively in my projects.
